page.title: 01REVIEW OF THE AREA
page.content: The block contains 2 villages and part of a third,{Marsh Gibbon,Charndon}and part of{Edgcott,}of which Marsh Gibbon is the largest,with a population of about 800. In this village there are two village stores,one incorporating a Post Office,there is also a butchers shop. Within the block there are found; 2 service stations,2 public houses,1 Church of England & 2 United Reformed Churches.The villages have a very limited service from 2 bus companies. Each village has a community centre and recreation ground. There is a First School with 3 teachers and 74 children. The villages are mainly farming communities but many people commute to work in other areas.
